eu.shooktea.vmsm

Class VirtualMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.shooktea.vmsm.VirtualMachine

  • public class VirtualMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    Single virtual machine with HTTP server on it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • VirtualMachine

        public VirtualMachine(java.lang.String name,
                      java.io.File mainPath,
                      java.net.URL pageRoot,
                      VMType type)
        Main constructor for virtual machine.
        Parameters:
        name - displayed name of virtual machine. Should be unique but doesn't need to be.
        mainPath - main path to virtual machine. More information about correct virtual machines are stored in VMType.
        pageRoot - page root of VM that is used by modules. It can be either domain or IP address.
        type - type of virtual machine.

    • Method Detail

      • toJSON

        public org.json.JSONObject toJSON()
        Converts virtual machine to JSON object. That JSON object is then stored in configuration file. During loading, virtual machine should be fully recoverable from that JSON.
        Returns:
        JSON representation of virtual machine
        See Also:
        fromJSON(JSONObject)

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns display name of virtual machine.
        Returns:
        name of virtual machine

        Returns main path to virtual machine.
        Returns:
        main path to virtual machine

      • setMainPath

        public void setMainPath(java.io.File f)
        Sets new main path to virtual machine.
        Parameters:
        f - new main path

      • getPageRoot

        public java.net.URL getPageRoot()
        Returns page root of virtual machine. Can be null.
        Returns:
        page root

      • setPageRoot

        public void setPageRoot(java.net.URL url)
        Sets new page root of virtual machine. Can be null.
        Parameters:
        url - new page root

      • pageRootProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<java.net.URL> pageRootProperty()
        Returns page root property.
        See Also:

      • getType

        public VMType getType()
        Returns type of virtual machine.
        Returns:
        type of VM

      • getModules

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Module> getModules()
        Returns list of all modules installed currently on that virtual machine.
        Returns:
        list of installed modules

      • update

        public void update()
        Runs update of virtual machine. Update of VM consists of two parts: updating VM's type and all VM's modules. This method can be runned every time, but it's also called for currently displayed VM in 5-second loop.

      • statusProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<VirtualMachine.Status> statusProperty()
        See Also:
        getStatus(), setStatus(Status)

        public java.util.List<javafx.scene.control.MenuItem> createMenuItem()

      • fromJSON

        public static VirtualMachine fromJSON(org.json.JSONObject json)
                               throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Loads virtual machine from its JSON representation.
        Parameters:
        json - JSON representation of virtual machine
        Returns:
        virtual machine loaded from JSON
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - if JSON contains URL of virtual machine, but that URL is invalid
        See Also:
        toJSON()
